landing.heroTitle: #1 Car & Motorcycle Rental in Your City
landing.heroSubtitle: Fast booking, transparent pricing, well-maintained vehicles. Book online now — hassle free!
landing.featuredSubtitle: Most popular choices from our customers
landing.registerBanner: Sign up now & get Rp 50,000 off your first booking!
landing.whyUsSubtitle: Trusted vehicle rental service with thousands of satisfied customers
landing.whyFastDesc: Pick a vehicle, fill the form, pay — done in 3 minutes. No queues, no hassle.
landing.whyTrustedDesc: All vehicles are regularly maintained with full insurance. 4.9/5 rating from 2000+ reviews.
landing.whyDeliveryDesc: Vehicle delivered to your location — home, hotel, or airport. No extra charge.
landing.whyPriceDesc: Starting from Rp 75,000/day for motorcycles and Rp 280,000/day for cars. No hidden fees.
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: 3 easy steps to book your dream vehicle
landing.step1Desc: Browse and pick a car or motorcycle that fits your needs
landing.step2Desc: Fill the booking form and make a secure online payment
landing.step3Desc: Your vehicle is ready — delivered straight to your location
landing.testimonialsSubtitle: Real reviews from customers who have used our service
landing.ctaSubtitle: Pick your favorite vehicle and start your journey with RentaGo

booking.title: Book Your Vehicle
booking.successMessage: Thank you! Your booking has been created successfully.
booking.paymentClosed: You closed the popup without finishing the payment
booking.checkOrderId: Please check your order ID again.
booking.completePaymentInstruction: Please complete your payment via the Midtrans popup that appeared. If closed, you can continue from My Bookings (for members) or check your email.
booking.authModalSubtitle: Register as a member now and get IDR 50.000 discount on your first booking.
booking.noBookingsDesc: You haven't made any bookings yet. Start exploring our vehicles and make your first booking!

track.title: Track Booking
track.subtitle: Enter your order ID and phone number to track your booking status
track.notFound: Booking not found. Make sure the order ID and phone number are correct.
